title: Beef stew with fluffy dumplings
description: This is the ultimate cold-weather comforter that will stick to your ribs after a hearty wintry walk.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz silverside beef, cut into large pieces
3 carrots, scrubbed and cut into large pieces
4 sticks celery, cut into large pieces
200g/7oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
